# 5.1
c = 3/8
F(y) = (1/8)*y^3
F(1) = 1/8
F(.5) = (1/8)*0.5^3=0.015625
(1/8)*1.5^3 - 1/8=0.296875

# 5.3
c = 1
-.5+.5*(-.5)^2+.5=0.125
F(.5) - F(0)
.5-.5*(.5)^2+.5-.5=0.375

# 5.5
c = 3
.5+.15*y-.002*y^3
.5+.15*3-.002*3^3=0.896

# 5.7
-e^(-.04*y)+1
F(5) = -e^(-.04*5)+1=0.181269
1 - 0.181269=0.818731

# 5.11
.5
.05
.5-2*sqrt(.05)=0.052786
.5+2*sqrt(.05)=0.947214
3*0.947214^2-2*0.947214^3-3*0.052786^2+2*0.052786^3=0.98387

# 5.13
25
625
25-2*sqrt(625)=-25
25+2*sqrt(625)=75
-e^(-.04*y)+1
-e^(-.04*(-25))+1=-1.718282
-e^(-.04*75)+1=0.950213

# 5.17
2
0.25
.5*.75=0.375

# 5.19
113.5

# 5.21
1/2
sqrt(1/12)=0.288675
0.1
0.25
0.75

# 5.29
mean = 105.3
sd = 8.0
z = (120 - 105.3) / 8.0=1.8375
0.5 - .4671=0.0329
(100 - 105.3) / 8.0=-0.6625
(110 - 105.3) / 8.0=0.5875
0.2454 + 0.2224=0.4678
-0.67*8.0+105.3=99.94

# 5.31
mean = 48.5
sd = 8.5
(57 - 48.5) / 8.5=1
0.3413 + .5=0.8413
(40 - 48.5) / 8.5=-1
(60 - 48.5) / 8.5=1.352941
0.3413 + 0.4115=0.7528

# 5.33
mean = .5
sd = 0.1
p = 0.2
z = -0.52
(a - .5) / .1=-.52
-.52*.1+.5=0.448

# 5.35
mean = 2.2
sd = .9
(1.3-2.2)/.9=-1
(4.0-2.2)/.9=2
0.3413 + 0.4772=0.8185
(1.0-2.2)/.9=-1.333333
0.4082 + 0.5=0.9082

# 5.37
mean = 2.2
sd = .5
(3 - 2.2) / 0.5=1.6
0.5 - 0.4452=0.0548

# 5.39
mean = 10
sd = .2
$20, $10
.5
230 - (20*10.6+10)=8
230 - (20*10.5)=20

# 5.43
no, it's not a bell shape

# 5.45
4.84/3.18344=1.520368, yes

# 5.47
(19.475000 - 14.550000) / 4.469774=1.101845, yes
